issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Backport concatenation of files into a single file to branch-1

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A new unit, integration or system test.
issuetype.name: Test

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Backport of concat requires editlog change and incrementing layout version. See [this comment|https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-4256?focusedCommentId=13525989&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-13525989].

Version number -41 will be reserved for release 1.2.0.
fields.summary: Add layout version for HDFS-4256 for release 1.2.0

This message is automatically generated.

Current LayoutVersion code does not work well when the last Feature is reserved for the older release, since the last Feature determines the current version.

Adding a notion of reserved for older release in Feature, so that appropriate layout version is chosen as the current version.
